thread.title: Ukraine Set to Federalize Whether Poroshenko Wants it or Not
thread.title_full: Ukraine Set to Federalize Whether Poroshenko Wants it or Not - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Ukraine Set to Federalize Whether Poroshenko Wants it or Not
text: Analyzing the chaotic situation around Sunday's upcoming local elections in Ukraine's regions, political analyst Alexander Vasilyev suggests that with local political forces presenting an ever-growing challenge to national parties, federalization in one form or another will become a reality whether President Poroshenko agrees to it or not. ...
